tool_description: Check the status of the UIDAI's Aadhar Card by just providing your UIDAI Aadhar card enrollment ID and time of enrollment.
name: Aadhar Card Status
title: Aadhar Card Status

api_list.name: Get token
api_list.description: Call this endpoint to get a unique token for the call to check status of the the aadhar.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aadharcardstatus.p.rapidapi.com/getToken.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aadharcardstatus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aadharcardstatus.p.rapidapi.com/getToken.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aadharcardstatus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
